ta.title: நாணயத்திற்கு பயனளிக்க இலங்கை
body_lines: முதல் ஒருநாள் சுற்றுலா இலங்கை அணி மற்றும் பங்களாதேஷுக்குப் பிறகு சித்தாகோனில் தொடங்க உள்ளது.
ඒ අනුව ශ්‍රී ලංකා කණ්ඩායමේ නායක කුසල් මෙන්ඩිස් තීරණය කළේ පළමුවෙන් පන්දුවට පහරදීමටය.

en.title: Sri Lanka to benefit the coin
body_lines: The first ODI is due to commence at Chithagon soon after the tourist Sri Lanka team and Bangladesh.
Sri Lanka captain Kusal Mendis decided to bat first.

summary_lines: Sri Lanka's first ODI against Bangladesh starts at Chithagon, with Kusal Mendis leading the team to bat first.
